channel.title: Git auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: How to develop in 2025: Improve your Workflow with VS Code, GitHub & Copilot
item.description: VS Code Workspace Settings Shortcuts First of all, I strongly suggest adding some custom shortcuts because the default ones are a bit unintuitive. For example, CTRL + SHIFT + ' gets you to the terminal, while SHIFT + FN + F6 brings you back to the editor, andSHIFT + B opens the sidebar. What a mess! …

item.title: sudoku
item.description: How to build a brute force Sudoku solver Follow my journey on how to build an algorithm that lets you create or solve Sudoku puzzles!
